name: The Staff of Law (2h)
data: It has magnificent weapon class for its type (average in general).
It decreases the users strength pitifully.
It decreases the users dexterity pitifully.
It increases the users constitution pitifully.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
